column2: "The Crimson Evil Dragon... So it's finally here."
"My apologies, Guardian. It's rather useless of me to place such a burden on yourself..."
"Now, now, let's not say such things Alisa. Instead, let's go over the plans."
"I will concentrate on preparing the barrier and seal for the Crimson Evil Dragon."
"As long as the Evil Dragon is inside the barrier, its movement will be slowed. That is when I want you to defeat it."
"This is the Laconium Sword. Legends say that it can pierce the scales of the Evil Dragon."
"Guardian, I'll entrust this to you. I will duplicate it within the barrier. I hope it will aid you for this."
"The scales of the Evil Dragon will regenerate old wounds. But within this barrier, it's possible to recognize its weakness."
"And when you hit a weak spot with this sword, it will open the old wound from the scales of the dragon."
"In other words, if we focus our attacks on the exposed wounds..."
"Yes, even the Crimson Evil Dragon will fall. If its power is weakened, and we cannot seal it, the trapped soul within should still be freed."
